participant_2.background:
I listen to music that helps me calm down and release my stress.
i m going riding on my boat today.
i like green apples.
i m a really , really good guitar player.
i have 3 kids.

content.text: It's going well! I'm about to go riding on my boat.
Nice! I love going on boats! Are you going fishing?
No, I'm just going for a ride to relax.
That's great! I love relaxing too. What kind of music do you listen to?
I like to listen to music that helps me calm down and release my stress. What about you?
I like to listen to music that is upbeat and makes me feel happy.
That's nice! I like to listen to music that is both relaxing and upbeat.
I can see how that would be nice. I like to play the piano to express myself creatively and connect with others.
That's amazing! I wish I could play the piano. I play the guitar, but I'm not very good.
It takes a lot of practice to get good at playing the guitar. I'm sure you'll get better with time.
I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older.
Because I'll be able to do more of the things I want to do, like play the piano and spend time with my friends.
That's great! I'm glad you're excited for the future.
Thanks! I'm feeling positive about it.
